text-align-last: end

This test checks that text-align-last property works properly.
The last line of each case should be aligned to end side.

LTR align is start

align-last is end.

LTR align is end

align-last is end.

LTR align is right

align-last is end.

LTR align is left

align-last is end.

RTL align is start

align-last is end.

RTL align is end

align-last is end.
